summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's receipt of funds available from the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009; accepting funds from the Pacific Northwest Center of Excellence for Clean Energy allocated through the U.S. Department of Energy, authorizing the Mayor or his designee to execute related agreements, increasing appropriations in the 2010 Adopted Budget for the City Light Department and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a two-thirds vote of the City Council.
